=== RY Toolkit ===
Contributors: fantasyworld
Donate link: https://www.paypal.me/RicherYang
Tags: tool
Requires at least: 6.0
Requires PHP: 7.4
Tested up to: 6.6
Stable tag: 1.3.0
License: GPLv3
License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt

Useful tools for more control over you website. Include cron, media, sitemap, OPcache.

== Description ==

= Media options =

* Set medium_large image size
* Set big image size
* Disable auto-generated image size

= WordPress buidin sitemaps options =

* Set max number of URLs in one file
* Add last modification date for post type sitemap
* Disable post type sitemap
* Disable taxonomy sitemap

= Tool =

* PHP OPcache flush or restart
* Clear, optimize database
* Disable XML-RPC
* Disable convert emoji to image

= Cron event =

* Show the cron events.
* Execute the cron event right now.
* Delete the cron event.

== Installation ==

= Minimum Requirements =

* PHP 7.4+
* WordPress 6.0+

== Frequently Asked Questions ==

= Where can I report bugs or contribute to the project? =
Report bugs on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/RicherYang/RY-Toolkit/issues),
or my [website page](https://ry-plugin.com/ry-toolkit/forum).

== Screenshots ==

1. Website frontend settings page.
2. WordPress core function settings page.
3. WordPress core sitemap settings page.
4. WordPrees core cron job info list.
5. Tools page.
6. OPcache info page.

== Changelog ==

= 1.3.0 - 2024/09/14 =
* Set sitemap options not autoload.
* Add sitemap option support skip some WooCommerce page.
* Add support remove data when uninstall plugin.

= 1.2.11 - 2024/07/20 =
* Upload filename friendly characters add "." .

= 1.2.10 - 2024/02/28 =
* Fixed same security issuu with echo string without escaped.

= 1.2.9 - 2024/02/24 =
* Fixed same security issuu with echo string without escaped.

= 1.2.8 - 2023/12/30 =
* Add show database tables size at "Site Health Info" page .

= 1.2.7 - 2023/11/15 =
* Add more action info for execute cron.

= 1.2.6 - 2023/11/07 =
* Fixed same security issuu with echo string without escaped.

= 1.2.5 - 2023/07/01 =
* Add plugin "WP Rocket" .htaccess rules option.

= 1.2.4 - 2023/06/24 =
* Add chagne upload filename to system friendly filename.

= 1.2.3 - 2023/06/23 =
* Add search for cron job list.

= 1.2.2 - 2023/06/11 =
* Fixed WordPress cron job list order issuu.
* Add more view for WordPress cron job list.

= 1.2.1 - 2023/06/04 =
* Add WordPress cron job action ( execute now / delete ).

= 1.2.0 - 2023/05/28 =
* Add WordPress core cron job info list.

= 1.1.1 - 2023/04/30 =
* Nice change options for sitemap.

= 1.1.0 - 2023/04/25 =
* Add download plugin archive file.

= 1.0.6 - 2023/04/06 =
* Fixed detection error with use remove_action to disable WordPress sitemap.

= 1.0.5 - 2023/04/05 =
* Add WordPress Sitemap options.

= 1.0.4 - 2023/04/02 =
* Change admin options page use tab.
* Add global disable comment and pingback.

= 1.0.3.1 - 2023/03/30 =
* Change WordPress cron tested version info.

= 1.0.3 - 2023/03/21 =
* Add WooCommerce image size name
* Add miss action successfully notice

= 1.0.2.1 - 2023/03/21 =
* Fixed admin options page javascript issue.

= 1.0.2 - 2023/03/21 =
* First release.
